bug.author: PiffPaffM
bug.summary: Generated docstrings should be in the API folder
bug.description:
Describe the bug Currently, the docstrings are generated in the docs directory. They should be in the haystack/docs/_src/api/api/ so that the links from haystack.deepset.ai are pointing to the right documents. <denchmark-h:h2>Error message</denchmark-h>
Expected behavior The files should be generated in the folder haystack/docs/_src/api/api/ so that the links from haystack.deepset.ai are pointing to the right documents. <denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
Go to <denchmark-link:https://haystack.deepset.ai/en/docs/apidatabasemd>https://haystack.deepset.ai/en/docs/apidatabasemd</denchmark-link> and click on Edit. The file is not found in haystack/docs/_src/api/api/ <denchmark-h:h2>System:</denchmark-h>
